values:
<center>Hey everyone,

New ep from tonight Tuesday 3rd July is up, & we have also changed from LJ to facebook. We are called 'Celerity Podcast' on facebook, so add us!

Here is tonights ep:

http://www.mediafire.com/?22dgywdywzm

Enjoy!
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/3581.html

Alright so as predicted, we won... & here is the link to download our special coverage of The State of Origin II. Our special guests this week were Jordan & Jess, plus Marcelo, so we all had a fun night.

Edit: Mediafire is working now & here is a much faster link!

http://www.mediafire.com/?c0tj3dhdmuq

Enjoy x
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/2938.html
Click here: http://www.mediafire.com/?azmxam2owg2 to hear an important message from Celeste.
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/2616.html

Alright so listen up fans, celerity is on the verge of getting axed due to lack of response.

Here's the deal, no comment/no substance which = crap show, therefore if we have no topics or guests celerity cannot continue.

Woah i hear you all cry, I can sense the urgency in this - so get thinking about what you want to hear, or who you want to hear & let us know!!
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/2549.html

Indeed the game was on tonight, in our Best ever yet podcast (i think you will definately all agree), to josh, i was extremely aware of your heart issues when the microphone crackles, so Dad took it upon himself to buy a new cable & it worked well tonight!! We hope you all enjoy this special podcast, tonight was a very good night, to all the NSW supporters, we know your sad but hope you can find it in yourself to cheer up enough to listen to this, so enjoooyy!

To Download: http://www.mediafire.com/?0nwevz5ye9g


Pre game nerd photo



Inhale



Exhale (but not fully yet!! don't want to jinx anything...



Now getting a little excited





'That's fine, we'll come back'



But you never did, did you Jess?



This is why your scared Marcelo ;)



Sore loser - that's cool... 

 

& that's how it's done!

All credit goes to Celeste who didn't want to do the podcast, but did, & is now up til midnight editing everything for your enjoyment. So you all better comment!! Oh and a poll.. after last weeks downfall, have we had a comeback? We'll leave it to you...
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/2162.html

Okay guys, so we are covering the State of Origin tonight on this special edition,
so keep tuned for when we upload it! We have had to pause it as we did a pre show special, & are covering it throughout the game. 

Photos will come too!

But first of all, here's a video Nicolette has made for her uni assignment,
& so I thought i'd upload it!! Have a watch, it's very good (obvy, because it has me in it!!) Enjoy!
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/1796.html

Okay so Vet first of all.. did I give you authorization to write a post? NO! My 12:30 am post suffices. (don't correct me on that). Okay so mainly we talked about Selo & Josh, so Ali, Erin, everyone else where are your comments?!!? P.S Josh I can imagine you having a heart attack, but we're workng on the cable! So indeed tonight was our second podcast & I of course did all the organising as I always do, & took it upon myself to take photos in the studio itself (aka my room).

The Rundown The 3 Canvas' behind Jman were the 'making out with the camera' photos he was reffering to.
Okay so here's the upload link.. tonight was a little longer compared to last weeks, but regardless just as awesome host(s?) ;) http://www.mediafire.com/?79ujztm7koi Enjoy kids x
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/1788.html

We're back for a second week and the hot topics are more riveting then ever!
We've also got some DVD style extras coming your way in the next week or so. I'm not going to give anything away but Jono, can you say sessions?
Love Ya'll

Rity
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/1429.html

okay so listen up!!!!!
Jono & Nic might POSSIBLY be doing the podcast tonight. This means that we don't have much to work with seeing as no one except selo (& possibly josh, i'll take as anon) has commented. So far these are the questions/comments/shoutouts being asked to them if it was to air tonight:

1) Why is Jono so inferior to Selo?
2) Shout out to Selo
3) Pumba vs Selo in a fight.

1) Why is Selo so inferior to Josh?
2) Shout out to Josh
3) Selo vs Josh in a fight (feat. cable-o-nine-tails) - someone care to elaborate on cable-o-nine-tails?

& that's all. So if you want to hear a good show, PUT IN A GOOD COMMENT! Remember we include every comment in the podcast so what are you waiting for??? GO GO GO hurry I'm doing the rundown soon.

EDIT: I am putting in a new segment called '20 in 60'. What it is, is basically a segment for our guests, where we ask 20 questions in 60 seconds & if you can answer them all you get a chocolate (or other prize). So I need 20 questions for Jono & 20 for Nic.. they don't have to be long just short ones, similar but hopefully less lamer than the ones we usually hear at Switch. Go go go we need Q's!
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/1188.html

attention!
Okay guys so we have to plan what we're going to have for our next podcast.
Our next special guests are Jonathon Marshall & Nicolette Powell.
To help us with deciding the next rundown of the show, here are a few questions that I want people to answer by comment.

1. Are their any questions you want answered by either Jono or Nic? Write them all down & we will definately include these.
2. Anything you want to say to them, shoutouts, we will broadcast it.
3. What hot topics do people want to hear discussed with our special guests?

That's all - if you have any other suggestions on what we could do feel free to let us know, we are thinking of doing it maybe Wednesday at the earliest, or maybe sooner depending on their hectic schedules - young love ♥.

Alrighty so let us know any feedback, & answer those questions, remember however much you say will judge on the content so comment up!

Celerity x
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/940.html

Hey there!

So if you're here, you're obviously, no doubt, waiting for our wonderful podcast.

Or maybe you don't even know about it! Well, it's just us - vet & celeste, and together we make celerity.

Tonight, Wednesday May 8th was our first podcast, & we had special guests -



Jordan Powell

&



Jessica Good!


Here's a link to download it, we hope you all enjoy it, & have set up this LJ purely for our podcast, & our fans of course - please let us know what hot topics you can contribute, or any questions you want us to answer on our next show, or even if you want to be a guest on our show! Comment here, & friend us! 

Below is the link to upload our very first podcast - we hope you enjoy it! Oh oh forgot to say it went crackly in a few bits because of the microphone so BEAR WITH IT, but it didnt miss out on too much you can hear those parts pretty much anyway. Notice how Jordan is the clearest? Anyway DO IT!

http://www.mediafire.com/?7jxdytj1o5m

Love Celerity x

UPDATE: We will be posting a new entry in the next few days about our next show, & the special guests once we have confirmed them, in that post we will also be asking for feedback, what questions you want answered, any issues/hot topics you want discussed, comment on that new post & we will be sure to include it, so keep checking back & friend us to see our newest updates.
http://xcelerityx.livejournal.com/759.html
